txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Mossward following the defeat of Madthrug, speak to Valaric Túcca in the Instance: Humble Beginnings.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete.</rgb>

If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to to Mossward following the defeat of Madthrug, and will be unable to complete your farewells in Lyndelby.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to skip directly through all newbie experiences into the main portion of the game.
Talk to your friend Valaric Túcca to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Mossward following the defeat of Madthrug, speak to your friend Valaric Túcca in Lyndelby.
